body.description: Get relief from dry and irritated skin with Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion. This rich, creamy lotion is made with virgin, unrefined coconut oil and coconut milk to nourish and intensely hydrate skin. It's also made with moisturizing botanicals such as sunflower seed oil and shea butter. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens, phthalates or synthetic fragrances. It is also not tested on animals.*

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion Get relief from dry and irritated skin with Alba Botanica Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion. This rich, creamy lotion is made with virgin, unrefined coconut oil and coconut milk to nourish and intensely hydrate skin. It's also made with moisturizing botanicals such as sunflower seed oil and shea butter. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens, phthalates or synthetic fragrances. It is also not tested on animals.*

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals. We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients. *see ingredients list Paraben Free Many of Alba Botanica products are packaged in bottles made from 100% post-consumer resin. Our unit cartons are made with FSC certified paperboard to ensure that the paper stock was sustainably sourced.

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful. To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated tomaking high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.
Alba Botanica Herbal Healing Body Lotion Alba Botanica Maximum Body Lotion Alba Botanica Unscented Original Body Lotion Alba Botanica French Lavender Body Wash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A beauty staple
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff and consider it my go-to for lotion. Very moisturizing, not greasy or sticky, and a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Creamy and lightly scented, this lotion is a good value. My skin feels more hydrated after using it and I’ve noticed softening at my elbows. Everyday body lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars DEEPLY MOISTERIZES with small amount.
reviews.reviewText: Deeply moisturizers with very little amount. Thick not watery. Lasts from shower to shower. Natural scent. Very subtle. Not perfumy! Durable bottle. A very environmental product. I have used this product for a few years now and have ordered through Amazon in the past year or so. And while in the past it was a hit or miss whether it leaked or not this recent delivery has an upgraded packaging that is just perfect. It was delivered in a box that was appropriate for its size and had plastic securing it in the box so it could not move and thus prevented any possible leak. So excellent upgrade and I'm very grateful to be able to order it especially since I live in a rural area. I have been without this product for about two months I think and have missed it enormously !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lid Came Loose In Process of Shipping
reviews.reviewText: I JUST now got it so i've not tried it yet, but wanted to let the manufacturer know they need to put a semi-hard plastic ring around the top of the bottle so this won't happen to someone else.I"m sure the lotion is good and i will update on that later, but for now i'm NOT happy that the bottle top came loose and now the inside of the "protective" (ha!) bag has a ton of the lotion in it. PLEASE add a secure plastic ring around the lids of this product in the future!I only gave it three stars for now because of the lid.**UPDATE**Apparently there WAS a plastic ring on the pump part, but it was definitely not secure. I don't know if these bottles go through something akin to a milkshake mixer en route to their destination, but the "secure" (HA!) plastic ring around the lid was almost all the way off.THE MANUFACTURERS NEED TO START PUTTING THE PUMP PART OF THE TOP ASIDE THE BOTTLE, WITH A SCREW ON LID. That way, when the lotion arrives at its destination, the buyer can switch the screw-off lid to the pump lid. I mean, SERIOUSLY, how hard would that be???Ok, now that i've vented, i CAN honestly say that the lotion itself is excellent.It's not greasy, absorbs into the skin very nicely and leaves skin buttery soft. Also has a really nice, light scent, not heavy or overpowering. Added a star for that reason.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very moisturizing especially for dry winter hands. Love using it after washing my hands a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like this lotion. Thank you for reducing plastic packaging of this plastic product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I live in Colorado, so a very dry state. This lotion it great to moisturize the skin but I don't like the smell. I love coconut but I would describe this sent as play doe smell. Five stars for the soothing, three stars for the smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Grateful for This Wonderful Skin-Saving Lotion
reviews.reviewText: Very appreciative of this product! It’s the only lotion I’ve used, ever since they’ve made it, for many, many years. Love that it has no scent - this benefit is huge. No worries about respiratory reactions, watery eyes, headaches…that I get from so many other products that are toxically scented.Another thing I really like: it doesn’t leave a greasy film on my skin. It seems to absorb well. Most important, in the winter especially, it prevents annoying and painful hangnails. I keep an extra bottle in the kitchen and use it on my hands after they’ve had to get wet. The bottle in the bathroom gets used after every shower. Especially nice after a leg shave.Here’s a tip: Use a knife to (carefully) cut off the bottom part of the bottle, once the lotion supply gets low enough to where the pump can’t reach - just keep it covered with plastic wrap and an elastic band, and then that remaining lotion at the bottom of the bottle can last another 2-3 weeks. I also fill tiny bottles with it to keep in my purse, and also bring it on every trip, as a remedy for overly-drying restroom soap. Keeps my skin in tip top shape. Highly recommended!
Love! Nice scent and goes on very thick and creamy. I’m using it all over body during pregnancy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Over the years I have tried many creams for very dry, scaly skin on my legs. I read about this product and thought I would try it. I am so very pleased with the results. My skin is now not dry and certainly not scaly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 17, 2018
reviews.reviewText: I suffer from dry skin in places and get some very dry skin and eczema around my nose, cheeks and brow. Hydrocortisone is one solution for mild eczema and just about works, but once you stop using it the eczema often returns. Thought I’d try this and thus far, a few days, it’s worth its weight in gold! The dry areas feel smooth and hydrated and the eczema has disappeared. No prescription creams needed! Another advantage is when you put it on your hands then don’t end up feeling oily for ages as there’s no paraffin in it! And no paraffin means reduce risk from flames and sparks. Result!
Great product for dry Canadian winters but my pump doesn’t work 😐

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 5, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Very good for dry skin, smells amasing.
